title: tip: update to new version of godoc
body:
I often check the document on golang/godoc.
But, I found it is not showed on tip.golang.org recentley.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. in browser input url: http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Constants

What is the expected output?

language spec

What do you see instead?

vfs_tip: in revStat("92bdf3b20f5263ea2443bce1ca40c427377bef74",
"ref/spec"), failed to get parent "ref": vfs_tip: error statting
"92bdf3b20f5263ea2443bce1ca40c427377bef74" / "ref": file does not
exist
